chatbot.evidence: The customer mentioned that they tried contacting customer support and all they hear is Toby the bot who cannot assist with their issues.

chatbot.suggestion: Improve the chatbot's capabilities to handle a wider range of customer issues.

complaint.description: The customer is unable to receive calls since May 13th, 2023. They tried contacting customer support but were not able to get assistance. They also encountered an error when trying to log the issue on the website.
complaint.suggestion: Investigate and resolve the issue causing the customer to be unable to receive calls. Improve the customer support system to provide better assistance to customers.

meta.review_content: Since the 13th May 2023 I am unable to receive calls. I tried contacting the customer support and all I hear is Toby the bot who can not assist with my issues. I tried logging it on the website and I get an error, 'advising oops something went wrong'! You can not get service from Vodocom. ***********, not client centric.
